Title: PNG LNG offers one LNG cargo loading in second-half October
Description: PNG LNG is offering one cargo that will load on Oct. 19-20 at the ExxonMobil-operated 8.3 million tonnes a year (mtpa) PNG LNG plant in Port Moresby through a tender that closes tomorrow.
Author: CK

Title: Torrent Power, Gail seek November-December LNG cargoes
Description: Indian power utility Torrent Power and state-owned gas distributor Gail have each issued tenders to buy one cargo each for delivery in November and December. Torrent's today closes today, while Gail's tender closes on Sep. 15.
Author: CK
